text: Riggisberg is a municipality in the administrative district of Bern-Mittelland in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On January 1, 2009, the municipality of Rüti bei Riggisberg became part of the municipality of Riggisberg. On 1 January 2021, Rümligen became a part of Riggisberg. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Municipalities in Bern-Mittelland
title: Riggisberg
